fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Azurelight__
Signature and BiS by a large margin. No other weapons come close.

__Any 5-star CRIT Weapon__
Ignoring their passives, which can be used to various degrees, they all are viable statsticks.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Finale of The Deep__
The best Craftable Weapon for Skirk that also looks nice. A healer is required, but most of her teams will have a healer. 

__Calamity of Eshu__
Given there is a shielder, this Event Weapon is excellent. However, without a shield there is very little reason to use this weapon.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Cryo DMG Bonus% or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Havoc: Warp
**2)** Elemental Burst: Havoc: Ruin
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Havoc: Sunder

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Marechaussee Hunter__ should be used onoly when playing with Furina. When in such teams, it can outperform __Finale of the Deep Galleries__. 

Both __Marechaussee Hunter__ and __Blizzard Strayer__, especially with Cryo Resonance and __Azurelight__ can mean almost no rolls should go into CRIT Rate, as it is incredibly easy to over cap. 

ATK% Goblets are viable, especially with Furina. Energy Recharge is useless, and under no circumstances required on Skirk.
